item.title: Aimme add a quote by William Shakespeare
Aimme add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "You cannot open a book without learning something." -- Confucius

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Every book is a quotation; and every house is a quotation out of all forests, and mines, and stone quarries; and every man is a quotation from all his ancestors. " -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "You may delay, but time will not." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Erwin Schrödinger
item.description: "The scientist only imposes two things, namely truth and sincerity, imposes them upon himself and upon other scientists." -- Erwin Schrödinger

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Do not think that love in order to be genuine has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired. Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing." -- Socrates

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A man who won't die for something is not fit to live." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Rupert Murdoch
item.description: "The world is changing very fast. Big will not beat small anymore. It will be the fast beating the slow." -- Rupert Murdoch

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Sir William Lawrence Bragg
item.description: "The important thing in science is not so much to obtain new facts as to discover new ways of thinking about them" -- Sir William Lawrence Bragg

item.title: Aimme add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace." -- Jimi Hendrix
